items.sentence: Tom and Mary have achieved remarkable results using their new technique.
How many people do you know who actually spend time with their children?
Tom would\'ve made the same decision I\'m making if he were in my shoes.
Tom promised himself he would study French for thirty minutes every day.
Tom didn\'t have enough experience in dealing with that kind of problem.
You\'d be amazed how often I\'ve seen Tom and Mary hanging out together.
Tom couldn\'t shake the feeling that Mary was hiding something from him.
Tom and Mary sat next to each other at the table in the conference room.
Tom was standing just in front of a large building that was up for sale.
Tom wondered when Mary had bought the milk that was in the refrigerator.
